data.comment: Today's referee, David Coote, has blown to start the match.
David Coote signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Everton.
In the minute 7, Free kick Sheffield.
Throw-in for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
Everton have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Everton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
In the minute 16, Sheffield pushes forward through David McGoldrick, whose finish on goal is saved.
David Coote signals a Everton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
Jack Robinson (Sheffield) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Everton.
At Bramall Lane, Everton are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In Sheffield Everton drive forward through Alex Iwobi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 24, Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Everton.
David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Everton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Throw-in for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
David Coote signals a Sheffield throw-in in Everton's half.
In the minute 27, Attention is being given to Sheffieldâ€™s Ethan Ampadu and play has been suspended briefly.
Ethan Ampadu is back on the pitch.
Throw-in high up the field for Sheffield in Sheffield.
In the minute 29, Everton are coming forward and Dominic Calvert-Lewin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Everton push forward at Bramall Lane and Ben Godfrey gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sheffield defence.
David Coote signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 33, Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Sheffield.
Oliver Burke is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 34, Sheffield's Oliver Burke looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 37, David Coote signals a throw-in for Everton, close to Sheffield's area.
Sheffield drive upfield and Ethan Ampadu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Everton defender.
Everton are pushing forward but Gylfi Sigurdsson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sheffield.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Sheffield.
In the minute 43, David Coote signals a Everton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 45, David Coote signals a free kick to Sheffield.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sheffield's Oliver Burke misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, David Coote blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 46, Sheffield to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Sheffield make their first substitution with Oliver McBurnie replacing Oliver Burke.
Throw-in for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Everton.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Everton.
In the minute 52, Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Everton.
Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 55, Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
Carlo Ancelotti (Everton) is making a first substitution, with Bernard replacing Anthony Gordon.
David Coote signals a Sheffield throw-in in Everton's half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Everton at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 59, David Coote signals a Everton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
Everton have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Mason Holgate of Everton gets in a strike, but is off target.
David Coote awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Oliver Norwood is replacing David McGoldrick for Sheffield at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 64, Alex Iwobi (Everton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
David Coote signals a free kick to Everton.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, The away team have replaced Michael Keane with Seamus Coleman. This is the second substitution made today by Carlo Ancelotti.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
John Egan (Sheffield) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Everton in the half of Sheffield.
At Bramall Lane, George Baldock has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick Sheffield.
In the minute 74, Andre Gomes is replacing Tom Davies for the away team.
Throw-in Everton.
Chris Wilder is making the team's third substitution at Bramall Lane with Lys Mousset replacing Rhian Brewster.
In the minute 77, In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Everton at Bramall Lane.
David Coote signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In the minute 78, Sheffield to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Bernard (Everton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal! Gylfi Sigurdsson gives Everton a 0-1 lead in Sheffield.
In the minute 80, That's a fine assist from Abdoulaye Doucoure.
David Coote signals a free kick to Sheffield.
Bernard is booked for the away team.
In the minute 82, In Sheffield Sheffield attack through Chris Basham. The finish is off target, however.
Everton have a goal kick.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 84, Sheffield have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 87, Sheffield are pushing forward but Enda Stevens's finish is wide of the goal.
David Coote awards Everton a goal kick.
Everton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 89, Everton drive forward but Ben Godfrey is judged offside.
Everton's Ben Godfrey has been booked in Sheffield.
Corner awarded to Everton.
At Bramall Lane the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Sheffield's Oliver McBurnie breaks free at Bramall Lane. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sheffield.
David Coote signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Sheffield's Oliver McBurnie gets his shot away but it misses the target.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Jack Robinson for Sheffield has been booked by David Coote and receives a first yellow card.
Jordan Pickford (Everton) has received a yellow card from David Coote.
